title: Add cat to heart memorial, bird to hexagon memorial, with black frames on all animal portraits

requirements.text: Generate a new heart-shaped resin memorial image that includes a cat portrait (replacing or updating the Whiskers memorial image), retaining the existing flowers and grass decorations, with a black frame border surrounding the cat's portrait within the resin mold.

quotes: put a picture of a cat in the heart shape resin memorial
Surround all the animal pictures within the resin molds with a black frame around the image of the animal

acceptanceCriteria: The heart-shaped resin memorial displays a visible cat portrait
The cat portrait has a black frame/border around it within the mold
Flowers and grass decorations remain visible in the heart mold image

requirements.text: Generate a new hexagon-shaped resin memorial image that includes a bird portrait (replacing or updating the Tweety memorial image), retaining the existing flowers and grass decorations, with a black frame border surrounding the bird's portrait within the resin mold.

quotes: put a picture of a bird in the hexagon shape memorial
Surround all the animal pictures within the resin molds with a black frame around the image of the animal

acceptanceCriteria: The hexagon-shaped resin memorial displays a visible bird portrait
The bird portrait has a black frame/border around it within the mold
Flowers and grass decorations remain visible in the hexagon mold image

requirements.text: Update the square resin memorial image (Nabi) so the animal portrait also has a black frame border surrounding it within the resin mold, consistent with the framing applied to the heart and hexagon memorials.

quotes: Surround all the animal pictures within the resin molds with a black frame around the image of the animal

acceptanceCriteria: The square resin memorial (Nabi) animal portrait is surrounded by a black frame within the mold
Existing flowers and grass decorations are preserved

requirements.text: Update the ShapeShowcases component to render the newly generated heart, hexagon, and square memorial images from frontend/public/assets/generated, replacing any previously used image sources for these three memorials.

quotes: put a picture of a cat in the heart shape resin memorial
put a picture of a bird in the hexagon shape memorial

acceptanceCriteria: All three memorial shape cards in ShapeShowcases display the updated generated images
No broken image links are present

constraints: Do not remove or alter the flowers and grass decorations in any resin memorial image
Black frame must appear around the animal portrait inside the resin mold, not around the entire product card
Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Adding a new resin shape or memorial product
Changing the overall page layout or branding
Modifying backend data models or order logic

required: Heart-shaped resin mold memorial with a cute cat portrait centered inside, surrounded by a bold black rectangular frame, with flowers and green grass botanical elements embedded in clear resin (whiskers-heart-memorial.dim_600x600.png)

Hexagon-shaped resin mold memorial with a colorful bird portrait centered inside, surrounded by a bold black rectangular frame, with flowers and green grass botanical elements embedded in clear resin (tweety-hexagon-memorial.dim_600x600.png)

Square-shaped resin mold memorial with a dog portrait centered inside, surrounded by a bold black rectangular frame, with flowers and green grass botanical elements embedded in clear resin (nabi-square-memorial.dim_600x600.png)
